Text: How am I supposed to install this? Yes I am so new at this.

Launch Fast IMG Unlocker 2.1.exe and point it to the map, wait for the process end.
The map is unlocked now.
Format a SD (filesystem FAT32), create a folder named Garmin and put the unlocked map inside.
Put the SD in a Garmin GPS.
Don't forget to switch on the GPS  ;-)
It dont have a ".tbd file to create a mapset for garmin mapinstall.

No programs needed to send map to device, simply copy&paste.
If you want to see the map on a PC, use BaseCamp (map in a pendrive (FAT32), Garmin folder).

Can you just add the gma and the ucx file in the download? It's simpler to install them with mapinstall then to compile with some programs.
Thanks

The digital authentication file (.gma) if created for the specific GPS's UnitID that request a download from Garmin servers.
You can't use a .gma file that cames from another GPS, simply it will not work.
GPSs that use .gma file needs a map unlocked with the tool included in the torrent.

I do not understand where the difficulty is to copy and paste a file into a device ...
Tenho um Aquarius trip  3,5" , 64 de RAM, e 500 Megahertz de processador, como instalar nele?
